about_the_game:
Try out Punch a Plant Demo to experience explosive VR punching action with a hint of tower defence!

Your weapons? Your rocket fists.

Your aim? Impeccable.

Your goal? Defend your generators from living plant contaminations - in other words - Punch a Plant!

Use your rocket fists to beat the contaminations, use the destructible environment to your advantage, find turrets, traps, health packs and more and get the high score!

short_description: Experience the Punch a Plant! Demo – Explosive VR Action Awaits! Unleash the power of rocket fists in this adrenaline-pumping VR demo. Your mission is clear: protect your generators from mutated plants. With precise aim and devastating punches, it's time to take a stand. Ready to Punch a Plant?
